metadata.title: CVE-2020-35730 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An XSS issue was discovered in Roundcube Webmail before 1.2.13, 1.3.xbefore 1.3.16, and 1.4.x before 1.4.10. The attacker can send a plain texte-mail message, with JavaScript in a link reference element that ismishandled by linkref_addindex in rcube_string_replacer.php.

criterions.comment: roundcube: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
